summary: I hate Endeavor as much as the next guy but this is important. This is part of Todoroki's character development, believe it or...
body:
DISCUSSION TIME!

I hate Endeavor as much as the next guy but this is important. This is part of Todoroki’s character development, believe it or not

This is a part of him moving forward from his anger toward Endeavor, because part of him wants to believe what was said. Part of him wants to be the strongest. To have a power better than anyone else’s, because that would mean he’d be on top, and he’d surpass even his father.

At least, if it turns out to be true, he could kind of find a light to the darkness in his past.

Plus, we def gonna find out Touya is his brother next chapter idgaf

tags: and don't get me wrong i love midoriya
but it's not the same thing
summary:
one of the reasons i love kiri so much is that he isn't the main character
a miracle didn't happen, he didn't suddenly gain...
body:
one of the reasons i love kiri so much is that he isn’t the main character

a miracle didn’t happen, he didn’t suddenly gain magic powers, he isn’t The Chosen One or part of a prophecy. he just worked hard to overcome his insecurities and he’s gotten very far! he’s still getting used to it, but he’s improved a lot!

Fate | 18 | She/Her

DeviantArt | Wattpad | Quotev | Ao3

Just a small time writer with way too much time on her hands. You'll find mostly anime fanfiction and gifs here on my page. I love talking to new people and making new friends to feel free to send me a message at any time!

Ask box is always open!

Angels of Death | Assassination Classroom | Attack on Titan | Black Butler | Blood Lad | Blue Exorcist | Bungou Stray Dogs | Danganronpa | Death Note | Death Parade | Devil is a Part-Timer | Diabolik Lovers | Durarara | Fairy Tail | Fate/Stay Night | Food Wars | Free | Fullmetal Alchemist | Haikyuu | Hunter x Hunter | Is it Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? | K-Project | Killing Stalking | Magi | Mystic Messenger | My Hero Academia | Naruto | Noragami | Ouran High School Host Club | Pokemon | Psycho-Pass | Seraph of the End | Soul Eater | Tokyo Ghoul | Yuri on Ice

Like my work? Support me on Ko-fi or PayPal!

title: Reminiscence | Shouto Todoroki x Reader
body:
The cold never bothered Shouto much. Not even then as he sat outside barefoot on the backyard porch did the autumn cold ever once send chills throughout his body. No, he preferred this temperature despite its constant reminder on one sole memory.

This was the time of year that you particularly liked most. You loved watching as one by one, the leaves slowly broke away from the trees and scattered in the air; the way the brisk air tingled your skin until Shouto was there to warm you up but most of all, the nights where you and he would just curl up together on the bench outside and just watch the world unfold before you.

Playing in the snow was something Shouto was under the impression that he outgrew years ago before meeting you. Even then, you could never get tired of collapsing into the huge piles of white fluff whenever they appeared in the yard overnight. It wasn’t something he would ever do under any other circumstances, but you were his only exception. He would do anything and everything if only just to see your radiant smile.

He looked down at the steaming mug of joy chocolate in his hands. It had always been your favorite to drink; going as far as to drink it even during the scorching hot season of summer. It didn’t matter where the two of you were or what the circumstances were; he could always count on finding you sneaking off somewhere to find any place ridiculous enough to be serving hot chocolate at that time of year.

So naturally, it became his favorite as well.

Even if the sweetness wasn’t something he could particularly stomach at the time, he would still always drink it. It connected him to you much like the whole season of fall. There was no way he could ever willingly give that up.

But as he sat there on that bench staring off at the glittering snow which covered every bare inch of green, Shouto couldn’t help but wish you were still there with him. He would do anything in order to see you laughing and playing in the snow, to have you seated there on the bench with your body curled into his for warmth.

Autumn was his favorite season because of you, but also his most hated. For he knew that without you, it could never be as special as it once was.

title: HandCrafted Chapter 12: Admission
description:
Ao3 - https://archiveofourown.org/works/14092506/chapters/38641181
Wattpad - https://www.wattpad.com/649790512-handcrafted-admission

Momo finally decides that she needs to approach Itsuka after avoiding her all week, and finally works up the nerve to go ahead and talk to her. The pair of them admit deep, personal things to one another as they attempt to explain their odd behavior.

blog.name: boutardieu
blog.title: The Parmenides Parlor
blog.description:
Subculture is to culture what mustard is to mayonnaise : you theoretically don't need it, but without it, you have 90% chances to end up with a bland and mushy porridge you'd rather shoot yourself in the head than use.

Plus... Come on, guys. It's mustard.

summary:
Yuuga Aoyama : Bonjour! It's nice to see you again, Tokoyama!
Fumikage Tokoyami : Likewise. Although it’s actually pronounced...
body:
Yuuga Aoyama : Bonjour! It's nice to see you again, Tokoyama!
Fumikage Tokoyami : Likewise. Although it’s actually pronounced “Tokoya-MI”.
Yuuga Aoyama : Oh, my deepest apologies! I was just shipping us out loud.
Fumikage Tokoyami : W-why? Where are we being taken?
